title: Inkscapetober Day 17: Collide
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**Inkscapetober Day 17:** Collide
**Author:** [[*user SleepOfReason]]
Check out more art [[[SleepOfReason creates art| here]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]


[[=image DrKens.png]]


**Subject:** DrKens

**Commentary:** DrKens has a reputation of brandishing the ban hammer in SkipIRC. And it's really brandishing more than actually using. Nonetheless that inspired me to make this coat of arms. We see the ban hammer in action, striking a troll. In the background we see a fine pair of hammers worthy of banning with. And the motto could just as well have been a DrKens quote. To recognize the fact that DrKens also has an interest in engineering, I placed the symbol of a transistor in the upper left corner.

**How the prompt fits in:** Another somewhat difficult prompt. A collision implies some form of motion, and that is hard to depict in a general coat of arms. So I decided to depict the exact moment of impact.

@@ @@
